  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120747</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120747</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Prizme in disperzija</string>
            <string language="en">Prisms and Dispersion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prismen und Zerstreuung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prismes et dispersion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prismas e dispersão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prismi e dispersione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρίσματα και διασπορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prismas y dispersión</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Odvisnost lomnega količnika od valovne dolžine in razlog za nastanek mavrice.</string>
            <string language="en">Relation between refractive index and wavelength. Description how to form rainbow with the white light passing through prism.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prizma</string>
            <string language="en">prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mavrica</string>
            <string language="en">rainbow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">bela svetloba</string>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lom svetlobe</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relation zwischen Brechungsindex und 
Wellenlänge. Beschreibung, wie man Regenbogen mit dem weißen 
Licht bildet, das durch Prisma überschreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Relation entre l'indice de réfraction et la 
longueur d'onde. Description comment former l'arc-en-ciel avec 
la lumière blanche passant par le prisme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relação entre o deslocamento predeterminado 
refractive e o wavelength. Descrição como dar forma ao 
arco-íris com a luz branca que passa através do prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporto fra l'indice di rifrazione e la 
lunghezza d'onda. Descrizione come formare Rainbow con la luce 
bianca che passa attraverso il prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέση μεταξύ του διαθλαστικού ευρετηρίου και του 
μήκους κύματος. Περιγραφή πώς να διαμορφώσει το ουράνιο 
τόξο με το άσπρο φως που περνά μέσω του πρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Relación entre el índice de refracción y la 
longitud de onda. Descripción cómo formar el arco iris con la 
luz blanca que pasa a través del prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenbogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weißes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">prisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arc-en-ciel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière blanche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arco-íris</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz branca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rainbow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce bianca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρίσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ουράνιο τόξο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
